TopicTitle: How do you zoom in and out during flight?

Articles.Content:
So pretty much, I landed my spacecraft back on kerbin and noticed a gold dot next to the sun (During sunrise) And I remembered a hazard ish video I saw where he zoomed in on duna just above minmus while on the ground

My goal is something like this : 

Does anyone know how?
Camera Tools mod i think? Not sure if you can do it with stock KSP
